    • Constructor Detail

      • TargetSelectionEvent

        public TargetSelectionEvent(double eventTime,
                            Scenario scenario,
                            Entity firer)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        eventTime - the simulation time at which this event should occur. Should be no earlier than the current simulation time.
        clock - the current simulation time.
        firer - The entity doing the firing.
